title: Mass Effect 2
notes:
Mouse controls seemed to be mapped to cursor location, ie, you'd hit a point at which you could no longer turn, as if the cursor reached the edge of the screen.

Sound did not work on first play, closing and re-running the program fixed the issue.

title: Mass Effect 2
notes: First time dialogs didn't work, but second time everything worked.

title: Mass Effect 2
notes: Performance is passable, but nowhere near to that on Windows. No noticeable graphical glitches. Controls are not stuck, gamepad is also working (Logitech F310 in X-input mode). Initial cutscenes went okay, quick sequence during Normandy attack as well, but right after "Project Lazarus" animatronic the game has crashed. Out of six attempts, it has crashed three times during transitions from loading screen into cutscenes and animatronics.

title: Mass Effect 2
notes: First time there was no sound but the second time it worked fine. Occasional FPS drops but otherwise totally playable
First run no sound, after character creation restart and it works.
title: Mass Effect 2

notes: No audio upon first boot, make character and restart for audio
